0.0.1.name: wordpress/gravity-meta
0.0.1.description:
A simple plugin to add custom URL parameters to Gravity forms as hidden custom fields.

Great for using custom analytics params with Gravity forms and learning where your leads come from.

Works with Google Analytics params too!
